news.title: Apple appeals against ‘unprecedented’ €500m EU fine over app store
news.summary: iPhone maker accuses European Commission of going ‘far beyond what the law requires’ in ruling. Apple has launched an appeal against an ‘unprecedented’ €500m (£430m) fine imposed by the EU.

news.title: Framework Laptop 12 review: fun, flexible and repairable
news.summary: Smallest and most affordable Framework still has brilliant modular ports, is upgradable and designed to last. The modular and repairable PC maker Framework’s latest machine moves into the notoriously difficult to fix 2-in-1 category.

news.title: Tesla shares dive as investors fear new Elon Musk political party will damage brand
news.summary: Shares in Tesla fell 7.5% in early US trading on Monday, wiping $76bn off the company’s value. Market frets that Elon Musk's launch of a new political party will present further problems for the electric carmaker.
